record.title: Implement token refresh before expiration, not after
record.content:
Don't wait for a 401 to refresh tokens. Instead:

1. Track token expiration time locally
2. Refresh proactively when 80% of lifetime has passed
3. Queue requests during refresh to avoid race conditions
4. Have a fallback for refresh failures (re-auth prompt)

This prevents jarring user experiences and request failures.

record.title: Store refresh tokens securely, separate from access tokens
record.content:
Refresh tokens are high-value targets. Best practices:

- Store in HttpOnly cookies (web) or secure keychain (mobile)
- Never expose to JavaScript
- Implement rotation on each use
- Set reasonable expiration (days, not months)
